content.description: Struggle through the weird crux down low to enjoy the finger and hands corner above. Expect a little redpoint crux, then immediately before the crack pinches off traverse left on large crystals to the top. Save some finger sizes for your last pieces.
content.protection: 5 bolts   Single rack   Slung horn w/ quicklink for anchor
content.location: The route doesn't actually summit any spire. But finishes right at the upper base of Sputnik. Hike the 3/4 gully and just before you would begin scrambling up the slabs keep your eyes open for the bolts on the left (west) wall. Single 70m rap.

content.description: This spire is half way up the Spire Three mass/ridge. Its the first spire that rises from where the ridge plateaus briefly. FA; Conns 12/9/57.
